results.Description: Mellow Mushroom provides a unique vibrant atmosphere that mirrors the quality and wide array of pizzas and calzones that are offered. Come often. Come Hungry.
results.Title: Mellow Mushroom

results.Address: Corner of Alderman and McCormick Roads
results.Description: More commonly known as O'Hill, this dining room has eight stations to choose from, including a vegetarian/vegan bar where entrees are prepared without animal protein.  Other options include made-to-order omelets and stir fry; as well as a Kosher Meal program and Hoo's in a Hurry- a flexible take-out program where reusable to-go containers are encouraged.
results.Title: Observatory Hill Dining Hall

results.Description: Newcomb Hall Dining offers something to please every taste with the traditional college cafeteria atmosphere.
results.Title: Newcomb Dining Hall (Fresh Food Company)

results.Description: The Clark Hall coffee shop is the Greenberry's on-Grounds.  Stop by and enjoy fresh roasted coffee and espresso beverages, not to mention your favorite teas and frozen java drinks.
results.Title: Greenberry’s in Clark Hall

results.Description: Enjoy a cup of quality coffee in the picturesque Nau/Gibson Hall.
results.Title: Starbucks at Nau Hall

results.Description: In the Nood stands as UVA’s premier gourmet noodle bar conveniently located right next to Newcomb Dining Hall.
results.Title: In the Nood

results.Description: Restaurants at Pav XI include: Chick-fil-A, Sushi, Freshens, Montague's Deli, Topio's and Burrito Theory. There is also a f'Real Machine, plenty of grab and go, and lots of impulse items-something for everyone!
results.Title: Pavilion XI

results.Address: First Floor of Observatory Hill Dining Hall
results.Description: The Crossroads is a food court and convenience store in one! Sbarro Italian Eatery features pizza and pasta entrees; GrilleWorks offers juicy burgers, grilled chicken sandwiches, and fries; and Pao’s Panini has paninis and specialty sandwiches, wraps, and freshly prepared salads. In addition to fresh foods, The Crossroads also has all your grab 'n' go essentials including personal supplies, grab 'n' go sandwiches and salads, snacks, Java City coffee, and a wide assortment of grocery products. Don’t miss the variety of organic products!
results.Title: The Crossroads

results.Description: The Biltmore provides a cozy American dining experience with a focus on house-smoked ribs and BBQ, huge salads and sandwiches, the famous Thumbs ‘n Toes, and the soon-to-be-famous Crusties.
results.Title: The Biltmore

results.Description: The Virginian brings the traditional atmosphere of an old-time saloon with quality Virginia food and drink.
results.Title: The Virginian

results.Description: Christian’s Pizza offers quality, thin crust pizza at a bargain price. Options range from vegetarian to Italian to meat eaters paradise.
results.Title: Christian’s Pizza

results.Description: Sushi Love provides traditional Japanese Food with an American twist.
results.Title: Sushi Love

results.Description: St. Maarten Cafe provides a mix between an American bar and Caribbean cafe.
results.Title: St. Maarten Cafe

results.Description: No. 3 provides a unique American cuisine with low prices and high quality.
results.Title: Poe’s Public House

results.Description: Take It Away sandwiches doles out the freshest gourmet sandwiches, salads, and soups that Charlottesville has to offer.
results.Title: Take-It-Away

results.Description: Fresh, local ingredients from organic, eco-friendly and sustainably maintained farms are the first step in this process. Unique, creative recipes based on classical preparations are the next step. Add to this equation quick, friendly service in a casual atmosphere, and you have Revolutionary Soup!
results.Title: Revolutionary Soup on The Corner

results.Description: Lemon Grass provides a delicious menu of Thai & Vietnamese dishes and delicacies.  Lemongrass allows you to choose form 10 levels of spiciness for all food.
results.Title: Lemongrass

results.Description: Pigeon Hole is the signature breakfast and brunch location in Charlottesville. The quality is only supplemented by the low cost and local sources for produce.
results.Title: The Pigeon Hole

results.Description: Trinity’s menu consists of comfortable, high quality “pub grub” in a comfortable atmosphere. Enjoy a bite to eat while watching your favorite game on one of the many televisions.
results.Title: Trinity Pub and Restaurant

results.Description: Marco & Luca Dumpling provide delicious tasting dumplings with a variety of side dishes and sauces.
results.Title: Marco and Luca Dumplings

results.Description: Starbucks on The Corner provides a convenient place to grab a re-energizing drink while on the move.
results.Title: Starbucks

results.Description: NY style bagels are served here with a profuse amount of toppings and side dishes such as soups and salads. If you are on a limited budget, this is the place to go for good food at a low price.
results.Title: Bodo’s

results.Description: Michael’s Bistro provides West Coast feel with a focus on local organic produce, craft brews, and good food. If you are looking for a place a little more formal to eat, Michael’s Bistro is your place to go.
results.Title: Michael’s Bistro

results.Description: Qdoba serves a variety of Mexican cuisine influenced food. Anything from burritos to quesadilla and Mexican gumbo are available. Though technically a fast food restaurant, Qdoba provides a healthy alternative to traditional fast food.
results.Title: Qdoba

results.Description: Little John’s provides the atmosphere and quality food of any New York City delicatessen. Whether you are looking for breakfast, brunch, dinner, or a light snack, Little John’s is the place to go.
results.Title: Little John’s

results.Description: Jimmy John’s provides quality sandwiches with a focus on ingredients, simplicity, and taste.
results.Title: Jimmy John’s

results.Description: Subway! Eat Fresh
results.Hours: Thursday & Friday 7 am - 10 pm, Saturday 8 am - 10 pm, Sunday 9 am - 9 pm
results.Title: Subway

results.Description: Two Guys Tacos has taken classic Mexican street food to a whole new level with some unique methods and recipes, including smoking and slow-cooking all of their meats. Combining affordable prices, quality ingredients, and a casual environment, Two Guys Tacos is an excellent choice for lunch, dinner, or even late night snacks!
results.Hours: Thursday-Saturday 11:00 am - 4:00 pm, Sunday 12:00 pm - 3:00 am
results.Title: Two Guys Tacos

results.Description: Basil presents an enticing culinary experience, reflecting the rich regional diversity of the Mediterranean.
results.Title: Basil

results.Description: Fig Bistro provides combination of classic New Orleans flavor with a bit of Mediterranean spice.
results.Title: Fig Bistro

results.Description: Toros Tacos brings to Charlottesville a carefree ambiance with traditional mexican food and drink.
results.Title: Toro’s Tacos
